text: Kenneth Eugene Boles (January 2, 1933 â€“ August 9, 2022) was an American Democratic politician and real estate developer. He was born in Milton, Florida. He was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 1978 to 1982. Boles died on August 9, 2022 under hospice care in Tallahassee, Florida at the age of 89.Kenneth Eugene Boles (obituary) ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Members of the Florida Legislature Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Florida Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Real estate developers
